name: Prop Hell
description:
This game is for Procedural Death Jam 2014, and my first attempt at making a game with procedural content generation. It was inspired by my former days working in the theater. Help Theater Girl find the needed prop and bring it back to the entrance. Watch out for prop golems! Throw props at them to knock off their pieces and stun them.

I used lots of art from OpenGameArt.org. See the credits page in-game for more info.

The constraints for the jam were:

  • Must showcase procedural content generation
  • Must feature some kind of permadeath
